org.kiji.rest.plugins
Interface KijiRestPlugin

All Known Implementing Classes:
StandardKijiRestPlugin
public interface KijiRestPlugin

Interface for plugins which will add custom resources to the Dropwizard environment.

Method Summary
 void initialize(com.yammer.dropwizard.config.Bootstrap<KijiRESTConfiguration> bootstrap)
          For every accessible plugin, this method is invoked when KijiRESTService initializes.
 void install(KijiClient kijiClient, KijiRESTConfiguration configuration, com.yammer.dropwizard.config.Environment environment)
          For every accessible plugin, this method is invoked when KijiRESTService initializes.
 

Method Detail

initialize

void initialize(com.yammer.dropwizard.config.Bootstrap<KijiRESTConfiguration> bootstrap)
For every accessible plugin, this method is invoked when KijiRESTService initializes. Bootstraps the plugin. Often useful for adding asset bundles.

Parameters:
bootstrap - the service bootstrap

install

void install(KijiClient kijiClient,
             KijiRESTConfiguration configuration,
             com.yammer.dropwizard.config.Environment environment)
For every accessible plugin, this method is invoked when KijiRESTService initializes. Creates and adds resources to the environment.

Parameters:
kijiClient - that this should use for connecting to Kiji.
configuration - of the KijiREST setup.
environment - of Dropwizard.
